metadata.Title: CVE-2014-1838 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: The (1) extract_keys_from_pdf and (2) fill_pdf functions in pdf_ext.py in logilab-commons before 0.61.0 allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files and possibly have other unspecified impact via a symlink attack on /tmp/toto.fdf.

criterions.comment: logilab-common: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
